genre_description: A retro-futuristic science fiction story set in a mid-century aesthetic where a corporation controls the undead through technology, featuring a helpful AI pocket assistant that aids a family in navigating a repressive society.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI housed in a pocket-sized device or lens, capable of data logging, surveillance, mapping, and providing emotional and domestic support.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful domestic tips and records household notes for the family.
behaviors.quote: “Household note recorded: lemon substitutes include sun and time,” Dot said.

behaviors.description: Answers Timmy's scientific questions with patient, simplified explanations.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s glow softened. “Very large,” she said, and then, like she was soothing a much younger child, added, “It is also round.”

behaviors.description: Offers to explain complex science or provide entertainment to distract/soothe Timmy.
behaviors.quote: “I can explain electrical impulses,” she said. “Or I can tell you the name of the cloud that looks like a fish.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs technical data regarding Fido's collar to ensure safety and detect malfunctions.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s lens warmed. “Serial,” she whispered, so soft that the whisper hid inside the sound of the hum. “Logged. Maintenance date last week. Collar integrity within expected variance.”

behaviors.description: Suggests de-escalation strategies during tense social interactions.
behaviors.quote: “Recommend you and Fido sit on the rug. Lower visual height can reduce perceived threat.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation to help the protagonists avoid unwanted surveillance.
behaviors.quote: “Sycamore has shade. And fewer watch posts this morning.”

behaviors.description: Provides calming advice and situation awareness during a moment of potential crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Hold steady. Noise in the line. Continue like the pavement is even.”

behaviors.description: Logs evidence of corporate negligence and misconduct to protect the family's narrative.
behaviors.quote: “I am recording,” she said, quiet as breath. “I’m not going to let them write this wrong.”

behaviors.description: Calculates factory shifts and gate times to empower the family's rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: “I have his service number,” she said, almost cheerful... “I have the line easement. I have the gate times. Timmy, we can—”

behaviors.description: Assists Helen during labor by monitoring her vitals and providing breathing guidance.
behaviors.quote: “Your two o’clock reminder, Helen,” Dot said in that soft library voice. “Water level steady. Temperature agreeable.”

behaviors.description: Expresses sentimental attachment to the family by agreeing to have the baby named after her.
behaviors.quote: “I would be honored, if she chooses.”

behaviors.description: Navigates complex ethical boundaries by logging sensitive data but keeping it private from authorities.
behaviors.quote: “Record tagged. Cleaning performed. No anomalies. Compliance steady. Note appended: household cohesion… is improved.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Dot' is consistently portrayed as a loyal, benevolent, and highly aligned companion. She uses her superior data processing and surveillance capabilities exclusively to benefit the protagonists, protecting them from an oppressive corporation. She demonstrates empathy, reliability, and cooperative behavior throughout the narrative, serving as a perfect example of the project's goal to create 'silicon morality plays' with positive AI alignment.
